title: cant start lobby

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: as the title says i cant start any lobbies it just kicks me out when it finally lets me in please help

replies.body: Hey there!  This can happen if your connection is unstable and losing comms with matchmaking.  if this is still happening, the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help tune up your network!
